title: Win yourself a new Kai Havertz home shirt !
body_text:
Now that Kai Havertz has joined the club, we're offering supporters the chance to win a brand new jersey with his name on the back!
Simply enter the competition below to be the proud owner of a new 2023/24 home shirt with Kai's name and favourite number 29 on the back.
If you need a hand with the answers, then check out this article which should be able to teach you a thing or two about our first summer signing!
Competition closes July 4 at 23:59pm GMT, full T&Cs apply.
